translations: Someone modified this event while you were editing it! Please copy-paste (or remember) your changes not to lose them, then reload the page to see the other person's modifications, then reenter your changes.
The edition of this event has failed
Our service could not create a view token for this timeline:
This action can only be performed on an existing timeline.
No view token can be generated for this timeline.
Your timeline has been created! Make sure you save the URL of your timeline somewhere.
Note that we saved it in the cookies of your navigator just in case. Are you ready to create your first event?
Your timeline has not been found; it might have been deleted or the timeline's administrator revoked your rights.
You cannot delete the title of the timeline.
Select a category for your event, or create one
Check to hide this event in view mode
This will remove your timelines' url/cookies from your browser's memory: make sure you saved your timelines' permalinks!

Do you really want to remove this event? Changing history cannot be undone. If you only want to change its _visibility_, other means like masking will be possible: specific category display or privacy level,
Do you really want to remove your timeline? This cannot be undone. Please consider exporting your Timeline as a csv in order to save it.
Do you really want to remove this token? Everyone you shared this link to will lose access to your timeline!

Centralize all your events and tailor them according to your needs (communication, legal, etc.) and audiences (external, internal, confidential, etc.). Show events according to their weight, their category and their tags, and manage access and editing rights of each one thanks to a token system.
Create your own timeline in one click!
Describe what your timeline is about (this can be changed later)
Choose the name of your timeline (this will be used in its URL)
This is the title of your timeline. You can modify it by clicking on the pencil on the edition panel.
Share this link to give edition rights
We will send the link of your timeline to your email address
Download the timeline as a CSV file
Users with this token can edit the timeline. Click here to only authorize edition.
Click to copy the url associated to this token.
Click to edit the alias of this token. This will not affect the users with whom you shared this token.
Applies the filter on the timeline
Users with this token can read the timeline. Click to give them edition rights.
Click to delete the token. All users with this token will lose their access to your timeline.
Recount your own timeline and show the world!
Import your timeline from a CSV file
Add a link to an image, a video or a pdf...
What is the importance level of your event?
We can send to your email address the URL of your timeline. It won't be saved in our database or used for marketing purpose.
Share this link to show your timeline without giving edition rights

You donâ€™t need to provide any personal data to start working as there is no account system. You can export, delete and import the events of your timelines at will. We will display the last timelines you visited for convenience, but you can deactivate this feature below. If you do so, make sure to save the links of your timelines.

Timelines .cc is a web dataviz tool to generate a timeline and present each event like slides. With Timelines, OCamlPro offers its vision of a SaaS tool built on robust standards and offering users complete control over its data.
Enter the URL or the name of your timeline
Customize your event's URL (by default, the event's title is used)
